*   R = random(xx)
**  Is a village NPC and non-killable

These are the rooms that load NPCs in Faerie

Green Oaks
----------
/d/Sparkle/area/faerie/rooms/greenoaks/park05    3 elder elves
/d/Sparkle/area/faerie/rooms/greenoaks/park07    3 elder elves
/d/Sparkle/area/faerie/rooms/greenoaks/road03    3 adult elves
/d/Sparkle/area/faerie/rooms/greenoaks/road05    3 guard elves
/d/Sparkle/area/faerie/rooms/greenoaks/road07    3 guard elves
/d/Sparkle/area/faerie/rooms/greenoaks/road08    3 young elves
/d/Sparkle/area/faerie/rooms/greenoaks/road11    3 adult elves
/d/Sparkle/area/faerie/rooms/greenoaks/road13    3 young elves
/d/Sparkle/area/faerie/rooms/greenoaks/road14    3 guard elves
/d/Sparkle/area/faerie/rooms/greenoaks/road15    3 adult elves
/d/Sparkle/area/faerie/rooms/greenoaks/road20    3 elder elves
/d/Sparkle/area/faerie/rooms/greenoaks/road22    3 guard elves
